ctu_text: This scheme can be availed only once during the employment period. \n\n**Note 01:** The bicycle should have a valid bill of purchase. Bill should have the name of the beneficiary, the shopkeeper&#39;s GST number, cycle chassis number, chassis should not be less than 22 inches. In case of a bill with incomplete details, assistance amount will not be given.
